verse.name: v1
verse.lines: All of us here are running a race

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: With challenges and hardships to face,

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: But are we running a race for God?

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: A race with great gain and a labor that's not in vain?

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Oh, let us run the race, the race that is set before us.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Let us fix our eyes on Jesus Christ.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: Let’s run with patience and grace for we’re on the winning side.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: Let us run, let us run the race.

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: Though there’s a time you’ll fall and stumble

verse.name: v10
verse.lines: Just stand up and don’t give up.

verse.name: v11
verse.lines: Give your best and strive to reach the end

verse.name: v12
verse.lines: For your incorruptible crown awaits ahead.

verse.name: v13
verse.lines: So, let us run the race, the race that is set before us.

verse.name: v14
verse.lines: Looking unto Jesus the author and finisher of our faith.

verse.name: v15
verse.lines: Who endured the cross, to save the lost

verse.name: v16
verse.lines: Who despised the shame, for our vict’ry to claim!

verse.name: v17
verse.lines: Let us run the race, the race that is set before us.

verse.name: v18
verse.lines: Let us run…

verse.name: v19
verse.lines: Let us run the race.

verse.name: v20
verse.lines: Let us run the race,

verse.name: v21
verse.lines: The race that is set before us.

verse.name: v22
verse.lines: Run the Race!
